(Hey Cyberwolf.  It wasn't taken personally.  One character said it 
to another character and that was perfectly fine.  It was never made 
to be personal. And nothing that goes on here is taken personally.  
Don't sweat it cuz I"m sure not. This was a misunderstanding and 
miscommunication.  OK, let it go. Anyway, back to the RPG)


::KitKat
She looked at everyone there.
"Hey guys, I really don't mind who helps put my leg back on. But I 
could use some help getting it back on. Draw straws, flip a coin, I 
don't mind. But please help me get it on."
As she walks to the lab. "Land Mine, Could you please grab my leg and 
ask Drill bit to bring the one that he made.  If one will not work, 
the other one will."
She walked into the lab and transformed into bot mode.  she sat on 
the table hoping that this would be finished, over and done with soon.
She just wanted her arm back so she could get back to fighting.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Phobia stood back watching the exchange.
> "I'd trust a Mechanibal (Comic book reference) with my leg before 
I'd 
> trust these two Jesters." Phobia thought as he watched the exchange 
> between the three bots, it was almost ammusing though, neither ones 
> function had anything to do with repairs. "If this is the future of 
> cybertron then maybe we should all be deleted."
> 
> He walked toward the entrance to make sure Megatron didn't return 
> unexpectedly, placed a baby there to warn him if he had to stop 
> immediately, then turned and returned to the eoom where the 
operation 
> was taking place. When they were done he'd have a few words of 
> encouragement for them.
> 
>
